statements: SELECT * FROM telemedicine_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM telemedicine_data WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT treatment_plan FROM telemedicine_data WHERE institution_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM telemedicine_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_id, visit_date, diagnosis FROM telemedicine_data ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM telemedicine_data WHERE institution_id = 1
SELECT * FROM telemedicine_data WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND visit_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT institution_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM telemedicine_data GROUP BY institution_id
SELECT DISTINCT institution_id FROM telemedicine_data ORDER BY institution_id ASC
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM telemedicine_data WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY visit_date DESC
SELECT * FROM TelemedicineData WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT medical_condition, consultation_date FROM TelemedicineData WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes'
SELECT consultation_date, patient_id, medical_condition FROM TelemedicineData WHERE institution_id = 2

SELECT institution_id, institution_name FROM ResearchInstitutions

SELECT institution_id, institution_name FROM ResearchInstitutions ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM research_institutions;
SELECT name, location FROM research_institutions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name, location FROM research_institutions ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT SUM(id) as total_ids FROM research_institutions;
SELECT id, name, location FROM research_institutions WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM research_institutions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name FROM research_institutions ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM telemedicine_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT r.name, t.data, h.advancement_description FROM research_institutions r JOIN telemedicine_data t ON r.id = t.patient_id JOIN healthcare_advancements h ON h.research_id = r.id WHERE t.data LIKE '%heart%';

SELECT r.name AS institution_name, h.advancement_description, h.outcome FROM research_institutions r JOIN healthcare_advancements h ON r.id = h.research_id WHERE h.outcome IS NOT NULL AND h.advancement_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY institution_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
